txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Coarse fur from the beasts in the central Lone-lands. Bring the fur to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth.
'With this, we can mend many clothes and bed rolls.\n\n'Thank you.'
'We have very little that is new, and what we have seems to need constant repair. Would you help us obtain items that we need to repair our clothing?'
Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth desires coarse fur from the beasts found throughout the central and eastern Lone-lands.
Deliver the coarse fur to Frideric the Elder at Ost Guruth
You accepted a task from Frideric the Elder to acquire coarse fur from the beasts in the central and eastern Lone-lands. You can find Frideric the Elder within Ost Guruth.
Wanted: Coarse fur from the beasts in the central Lone-lands.
